ComicInfo.Summary:
James Harren returns!
Things seem to be going well for the BPRD. With their alliance with the military, they now have all the munitions they need, and, after New York, an easy mission to clear a small town. But the town has strange connections to Howardsâ€™s past as a prehistoric warrior, and more than its share of monsters.
